content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs. Can I get your name to get started?
Uh, sure, it's Greg. I need someone to fix my kitchen sink, it's leaking everywhere.
Thank you, Greg! Can you please provide your address so I can check if you're within our service area and get things moving?
Thanks for the address! Let me quickly check if that's within our service area.
reason: Unable to determine service area for provided address.

content: I'm having trouble confirming if your address is in our service area. Let me get a team member to help you out. Please hang tight!
reason: Agent unable to determine service area, requesting human help.

content: Hi Greg, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. There was an issue confirming your address. Just to verify, is your apartment in the city limits of Lakeshore? If yes, I can quickly confirm your eligibility and help you get scheduled.
Great, thanks for confirming! You are within our service area. Let me get some times available for a plumber to visit. Do you have any preferred days or times?
